titleStmt.title: Here begynnethe the lanterne of lyght
Lanterne of lyght.
titleStmt.author: Grime, John, attributed name.
Hardy, William, fl. 1535, attributed name.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Fletestrete, by me Robert Redman, dwellyng at the sygne of the George, nexte to Saynt Dunstones church,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Grime and to William Hardy.
Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.

place.placeName: the sygne of the George, nexte to Saynt Dunstones church
